attributes.action: force all MPs involved in the expenses scandal to stand down now not wait until the next election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any MPs who have declared their intention to stand down at the next election due to invalid or immoral expenses should stand down immediately, they should not be entitled to further pay and pension benefits by staying on. Also any MPs who have paid back invalid or immoral expenses but have not been asked to stand down should have to re-stand for their seat immediately, let the public have their say, regardless of the amount of the repayment

rejection.details: Government does not control who sits in Parliament. This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/ or the relevant political party(ies).
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
